name: Spatial distribution in sediment characteristics and benthic activity on the northwestern Black Sea shelf: macrobenthos
description: This dataset is the outcome of researchdone on the benthicsystem of the Black SeaShelf. Data on macrobenthos (density and biomass), oxygen flux to the sedimentand sediment characteristics are presented.
